item.name: Comme Des Garçons Play x Converse All Star High-Top

descriptions.description: Cotton All Star high-top sneakers from Comme Des Garçons Play x Converse featuring a printed logo, a lace-up front fastening, a branded insole, a round toe and a flat rubber sole.
The radiance lives on in the Nike Air Force 1 '07 Craft, the b-ball icon that puts a fresh spin on what you know best: crisp leather, clean lines and the perfect amount of flash to make you shine.
This iteration features a wild, crocodile-inspired texture on the Swoosh.
Retro '80s tennis style inspires the Continental 80's design.
These low-top shoes have a nostalgic look with a swooping two-tone stripe on the side and a logo window near the laces.
A split rubber cupsole with an EVA insert provides a comfortable, flexible feel.
Leather upper with synthetic leather overlays
Enjoy the comfort and performance of OrthoLite® sockliner; Lightweight EVA midsole insert

item.name: Nike Stussy x Benassi 'Off Noir' Beach and Pool Slides/Slippers

descriptions.description: From the beach to the bleachers, the Nike Victori One perfects a classic, must-have design.
Delivering lightweight comfort that's easy to wear, it's updated with softer, more responsive foam.
The contoured grip pattern helps cradle and hold your foot in place while the new padded strap feels as good as it looks.
Two-tone casual sliders with embossed logo
